name: Escape the Bug
description:
The controls and the goal of the game:

You control the "" icon with WASD or the arrow keys, you need to escape from the circle without being killed by the bug, the game is possible, but it's so hard that it seems impossible.

Infos about the game:

This game is made by HossamEL2006 for the Trijam#155 in less than 2 hours, under the theme: gameplay under 1 minute.

This is my second submission for this jam, the first submission is "Speedrun Unlocked !", Click here to play it.

You can check how to win this game on my youtube channel: Click here

Credits :

"" icon: by Kiranshastry.

bug icon: by Dave Gandy.

Tool used:

Game engine: Unity

IDE: Visual Studio 2019
